ruleContent.content: .con@html##{{chapter.title}}|.*中途有事离开.*接着观看！.*|.*\(本章完\).*

bookSourceComment:
❗️一些功能
1、每隔八小时访问一遍签到（使用的时候访问）
2、点击“登录”自定义发现
3、更改过发现要刷新本书源才会生效
4、点击章节链接可以查看评论，注意要设置成内部浏览器，长按章节链接可以设置
5、设置源变量或设置书籍变量可以查看一些功能说明

❗️注意事项:
1、请不要退出晋江app的账号，只要点了退出，或者在其他地方登录了，都要重新抓token。
2、更新token，书籍就要更新目录。
3、【抓包token登录】和【账号登录】二选一，【抓包token登录】的优先级高些，填了【抓包token登录】，就是按【抓包token登录的值】登录

4、登录步骤【设备保护关闭的状态下】：
①填写好账号密码，点击“邮箱验证码”或者“手机验证码”
②填写好验证码，点击“邮箱登录”或者“手机登录”
③想要确认是否成功可以在登录UI里点右上角三点，查看登录头token里是否有值。
④如果弹出提示“请校检验证码”，可尝试填入上一次发送给你验证码。

5、如果邮箱和手机号无法登录，可能是需要过滑动验证码，可尝试先在晋江app里登录一遍后，再在阅读里登录，❗️还是不行就只能抓包token，填写在“抓包token登录”处。

// 解析分类数据
function parseCategory(data) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow] = data.split(separator);
  
  const fullUrl = /^\d+|natural/.test(url) 
    ? `http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%22${url}%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148`
    : url;
  
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// 解析标签数据
function parseTag(data, tagCategory) {
  const [title, url, num = defaultNumPerRow, tagType] = data.split(separator);a();
  
  let fullUrl = url;
  if (tagType === "bq") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=${url}&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;l();
  } else if (tagType === "at") {
  	fullUrl = `https://app-cdn.jjwxc.com/androidapi/authorColumn?authorid=${url}`;
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "class") {
  	fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{'method':'POST','body':\"versionCode=313&token=${token}&order=0&classId=${url}&backupTime=${Date.now()}\"}`
  	
  	}else if (tagType === "lx") {
    fullUrl = `https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=${tagCategory}&sd=0&lx=${url}&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token=${token}`;
  }
  return [title, fullUrl, num];
}

// 创建 FlexBox 对象
function createFlexBox(title, url, num) {
  const flexBasisMap = { 1: 1, 2: 0.4, 3: 0.25, 4: 0.2, 5: 0.15, 7: 0.1, 10: 0.05 };
  return {
    title,
    url: url || '',
    style: {
      layout_flexGrow: 1,
      layout_flexBasisPercent: flexBasisMap[num]
    }
  };
}

// 生成分类结果
const result = [];
result.push(createFlexBox(`📂 我的收藏`, "https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/incrementFavorite,{\"method\":\"POST\",\"body\":\"versionCode=313&token={{Map('token')}}&order=0&classId=&backupTime={{Date.now()}}\"}", 1));

if(ShelfNum){
const ShelfNumList = String(ShelfNum).split(",");
ShelfNumList.forEach(x => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(ShelfList[x]);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});
}


authorNames.forEach(tag => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(tag, tagCategory);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});

all.forEach(item => {
  const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
});

const enabledCategoryList = enabledCategories.split(",");
enabledCategoryList.forEach(categoryIndex => {
  const categoryName = categories[categoryIndex];
  if (categoryData[categoryName]) {
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${分类标识} ${categoryName}连载`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].连载.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${分类标识} ${categoryName}完结`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].完结.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
    result.push(createFlexBox(`${榜单标识} ${categoryName}榜单`, null, 1));
    categoryData[categoryName].榜单.forEach(item => {
      const parsedItem = parseCategory(item);
      result.push(createFlexBox(parsedItem[0], parsedItem[1], parsedItem[2]));
    });
  }
});

result.push(createFlexBox(`${标签标识} ${tagName}标签`, null, 1));
tags.forEach(tag => {
  const parsedTag = parseTag(tag, tagCategory);
  result.push(createFlexBox(parsedTag[0], parsedTag[1], parsedTag[2],parsedTag[3]));
});

JSON.stringify(result)

try{ const bbb = book.getVariable("custom"); const sss = source.getVariable(); if (/jjwxc|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { function decode(){ baseUrl = `https://app.jjwxc.org/androidapi/chapterContent?versionCode=381&${bDe(baseUrl)}`; //let date = "Mobile " + Date.now(); let response = java.get(baseUrl, {}); let content = String(response.body()); isPay = !/"content"/.test(content); if(isPay){ let accesskey = String(response.header("accesskey"));l(); let keyString = String(response.header("keystring")); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v6 = accesskey.charCodeAt(accesskeyLen - 1); let v9 = 0; for (var i = 0; i < accesskey.length; i++) { v9 += accesskey.charCodeAt(i);l(); } let v15 = v9 % keyString.length; let v17 = Math.floor(v9 / 65); let v18 = keyString.length; let v43 = keyString.substring(v15, v17 + v15 > v18 ? v18 : v17 + v15);l(); let v32 = content.length; let [v38, dest] = (v6 & 1) !== 0 ? [content.slice(-12), content.slice(0, -12)] : [content.slice(0, 12), content.slice(12)]; let key = java.md5Encode(v43 + v38).slice(0, 8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).slice(0, 8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(dest); } return content } let intro = String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g, ''); const hasContent = /"content"/.test(result); java.setContent(hasContent ? result : decode()); intro = intro ? `◎${intro}◎
` : ''; let content = String(java.getString("$..content")); let saybody = (/关闭作话/.test(bbb) || /关闭作话/.test(sss))?"":java.getString("$..sayBody"); let say = /[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/.test(saybody) ? `\n【📢作者有话说】\n${saybody}` : ''; if (/token|vipContent/.test(baseUrl)) { const vipc = content.length > 30 ? java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", "KW8Dvm2N", "1ae2c94b").decryptStr(content) : `${java.getString("$..message")}\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文`; result = intro + vipc + say; } else { result = intro + content + say; } } else { result = ""; } // 评论处理 if (/评论\d+/.test(bbb) || /评论\d+/.test(sss)) { const commentNum = (/评论(\d+)/.exec(bbb) || /评论(\d+)/.exec(sss))[1]; const commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/, 'comment').replace(/chapterContent/, 'getCommentList') + `&limit=${commentNum}&offset=0`; const comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); const cflag = comment.code === "200" || comment.code === undefined; let commentb = ''; if (cflag) { const commentList = comment.commentList || comment.data?.commentList || []; commentb = commentList.map(b => `@${b.commentAuthor} 🕘${b.commentDate}\n${b.commentBody}\n‎\n`).join(''); } else { commentb = comment.message; } result += `\nㅤ\n最新评论：\n${commentb.replace(/<br>/g, '\n')}`; } result; }catch(e){} ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎|◎undefined◎
ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
//去除章节简介与正文重复
if(/^◎/.test(result) ){
	chapter = result.match(/◎([\s\S]+?)(…)*◎/)[1].replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'，');
	chapter2=result.match(/◎[\s\S]+?◎([\s\S]+)/)[1].replace(/\s/g,'').replace(/,/g,'，');

	//前4个字相同就删除
	num = 4;
	if(chapter.substring(0,num)==chapter2.substring(0,num)){
		result = result.replace(/◎[\s\S]+?◎\s*/,'')
	}else{result}
}else{result}

function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {
    var paragraphs = text.split('\n');
    var firstParagraph = paragraphs[0].trim();
    var containsSpecialChar = firstParagraph.includes('◎');
    var targetIndex = containsSpecialChar ? 1 : 0;
    var targetParagraph = paragraphs[targetIndex].trim();
    var lastChar = targetParagraph.charAt(targetParagraph.length - 1);
    var isPunctuation = /[——◎。！？，；：、\.\?!,;:》 】）”’…~"'\)]/.test(lastChar);
    
    if (!isPunctuation) {
        for (var char of chapterTitle) {
            if (targetParagraph.includes(char)) {
                if (char === ' ' || char === '☪') continue;
                java.log("删除当前段落："+targetParagraph)
                java.log("当前章节名："+chapterTitle)
                java.log("相同文字："+char)
                paragraphs.splice(targetIndex, 1);
                break;
            }
        }
    }
    return paragraphs.join('\n');
}

let bbb = String(book.getVariable("custom"));
let sss = String(source.getVariable());

//净化第一段章节名
if(/净化/.test(sss)||/净化/.test(bbb))result = removeDuplicatedParagraphs(result, title);
result = result.replace(/<br\/>/g,'\n');

result
</js>

variableComment:
❗️缓存过的东西都是需要刷新才生效【正文，目录】

1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号 

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现
符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写[目录简介【删除】]——删除正文章节简介【需要更新目录后刷新正文】

填写[关闭作话]——删除作话

填写[净化] —— 这个是用来删除正文第一段是章节名的，可能会误伤。

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则正文显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】


2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

header:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = 
  	{
    "action": ""
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
      source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
      java.toast("请按照规则修改源变量，已重置源变量！")
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
    source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
  }
</js>
